title: Chinna Chinna Kiliye Lyrics Kannedhirey Thondrinal
stanzas:
chinna chinna kiliye
panjchavarna kiliye

paal chottum natchathiram
paarththaayaa
thaen mottum mullai mottum
paarththaayaa
kalavaadum minnal ondrai
paarththaayaa
kankothuum paravai ondrai
paarththaayaa

kannaal kandaal nee sollu
un kaazhil vizhuven nee sollu
chinna chinna kiliye
panjchavarna kiliye

nilaa nilaa kaadhal nilaa
aval vaazhvathu ulloorilaa
ulaa ulaa vaa vennilaa
kanvaazhvathu kanneerilaa

paadhai konda manne
avalin paadha suvadu
paarththaayaa

thogai konda mayile avalin
thuppattaavai paarththaayaa
oonjchalaadum mugile avalin
uchchanthalaiyai paarththaayaa
odugindra nadhiye avalin
ullangaalai paarththaayaa

kannaal kandaal nee sollu
un kaazhil vizhuven nee sollu
chinna chinna kiliye
panjchavarna kiliye

engae engae vinmeen engae
pagal vaanile naan thaedinen
angae ingae kaanom endru
adivaanile naan aerinen

koodu thaedum kiliye
avail veedu engae
paarthaayaa

ullaadum kaattre
avalin ullam sendru
paarthaayaa

thooral podum thuliye
uyirai thottu ponaval
paarthaayaa

panju pondra nenjai
theeyil vittu ponaval
paarthaayaa

kannaal kandaal nee sollu
un kaazhil vizhuven nee sollu
chinna chinna kiliye
panjchavarna kiliye

Paal chottum natchathiram
paarththaayaa
thaen mottum mullai mottum
paarththaayaa
kalavaadum minnal ondrai
paarththaayaa
kankothum paravai ondrai
paarththaayaa

kannaal kandaal nee sollu
un kaazhil vizhuven nee sollu
chinna chinna kiliye
panjchavarna kiliye
